ModulePrefs.title: IMO Web Messenger
ModulePrefs.author: imo
ModulePrefs.description: imo is a web messenger and video chat service. It lets you IM your buddies on AIM, Google Talk, MSN, Yahoo, MySpace, and Skype. It's fun, easy to use, and requires no downloads.

Module.Content:
<script src="http://imo-im.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/js/preload.js" type="text/javascript"></script> <script src="http://imo-im.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/js/surf.js" type="text/javascript"></script> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://imo-im.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/css/surf.css" /> <link rel="shortcut icon" href="http://imo-im.googlecode.com/images/favicon.ico" />
<script type="text/javascript"> var g_start_time = (new Date()).getTime(); gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(IMO.UI.X.init); </script>
